      • menuOption4

        public static void menuOption4(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Load a previously saved Naive Bayes Classifier from a specified file and apply new cases to it dynamically. Requires classifier file as well as original data file for Attribute labeling.
        Parameters:
        sc - scanner object initialized in main
